Iâ€™ve explained that itâ€™s a one-time cost per server and that this should be resolved once Redis is deployed. However, that explanation doesnâ€™t seem to be sufficient for some folks to release this beyond where it' s at, so I wanted to see what the precise timeline is; the value is high. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8aiqg","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5daf4","text":"// this is related to the v5 end point discussion. body.serializedContentState: {"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":7,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"7b1qp","text":"Q2 2025","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8i54q","text":"The Graph crew will continue to operate at reduced capacity this quarter, with the following service levels changes:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9uae8","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":20,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":20,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"},{"length":22,"offset":47,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"9chod","text":"Graph Schema Reviews: Resuming twice a week on Tuesdays and Thursdays","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":27,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"1k1ji","text":"Building on GraphQL Channel: Will remain open for developer discussions, with no active support from the Graph crew.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":26,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"fhv28","text":"Graph Champions Group Chat: Continues to be fully supported by the Graph crew.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"length":15,"offset":117}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"},{"length":15,"offset":117,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"brcad","text":"PR Reviews: Support remains on a first-come, first-served basis.
